text: Moshi kare-ra ga arra to shito kara jibun-tachi ni atae rareta mono ni manzoku surunaraba, ko iubekideatta. `Arra wa, watashi-tachi ni totte banzende ara remasu. Arra to shito wa, sono megumi ni yori (sarani oku o) watashi-tachi ni atae rarerudeshou. Watashi-tachi wa (tadashi michi o fumu yo) arra ni tangan shimasu
